title: LAIR / EXIT DOOR
description: Door interactable, open the door, let Kim in. Kim possibly hidden behind fog of war.

dialogueTree.title: Door: "Two rusty metal plates that slide a..."
dialogueTree.text: Two rusty metal plates that slide apart form a crude door. It's been here under the boardwalk for a while.

links.title: You: ""Who's there?""
links.text: "Who's there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What do you mean 'who's there'? It..."
links.text: "What do you mean 'who's there'? It's me, Kim. Stop playing around and help me get this door open."

links.title: You: "Push the doors open."
links.text: Push the doors open.

links.title: Door: "It's *much* easier from this side -..."
links.text: It's *much* easier from this side -- the panels on the rails slide once you dust the sand off. With the help of your partner from the other side the doors open with a *creak*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh, I hope no one *dangerous* hea..."
links.text: "Huh, I hope no one *dangerous* heard that."

links.title: You: ""You ready?""
links.text: "You ready?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Time to investigate these pas..."
links.text: "Yes. Time to investigate these passages. Let's move quietly and not make more sound."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Not *running* is a great way to do..."
links.text: Not *running* is a great way to do that.

links.title: You: ""How did you even get there?""
links.text: "How did you even get there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After you *climbed* up to the roof..."
links.text: "After you *climbed* up to the roof, you mean? There's a maintenance entrance under the boardwalk. It's next to a drain pipe, possibly a storm drain -- it was easy to miss before."

links.title: Empathy: "He's quite proud of himself."
links.text: He's quite proud of himself.

links.title: You: ""Could have saved me the effort.""
links.text: "Could have saved me the effort."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He shrugs. "At least now we have an..."
links.text: He shrugs. "At least now we have an exit. So, let's get going. It's time to investigate these passages..."

links.title: You: ""Maintenance entrance? So pedestria..."
links.text: "Maintenance entrance? So pedestrian."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes, it's *cool* to risk your..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, it's *cool* to risk your life climbing rickety ladders. Anyway, let's investigate these passages..."

links.title: You: ""At least now we know a quick way i..."
links.text: "At least now we know a quick way in and out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, we have an exit. So, let's ge..."
links.text: "Yes, we have an exit. So, let's get going. Time to investigate these passages..." He peers into the darkness.

links.title: Door: "The doors seem to be on rails, but..."
links.text: The doors seem to be on rails, but they've gotten jammed. You grab a side and put some strength into prying it open. With the help of your partner the two metal panels slide open with a *creak*.

links.title: You: "Ignore the door. [Leave.]"
links.text: Ignore the door. [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer? Are you okay in there?""
links.text: "Officer? Are you okay in there?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You really ought to open this door...."
links.text: You really ought to open this door. It's dangerous to go ahead alone.
